message: The taps were not ilegal. They were all approved by the justice, the process was running in secret to avoid interference, but once Lula was nominated minister, government manoeuvre to avoid his prosecution, The judge, through legal means, declared the process as public And legally exposed all evidence. If you were a lawyer, a good one, if you had studied law in Brazil you would know that! I remind you Latin countries legal system follow the Romam law, different from what happens in UK and US. And you are also wrong about Brazilians, all we want is all corrupted people to pay for their crimes. Mas vc e brasileiro e entende bem portugues, esta defendendo bandido, quem defende o Lula hoje vai acabar defendendo Aecio amanha! Quem anda com porcos farelos come! Lula e ladrao e ha mil provas quanto a isso! Acorda petista!!!

actually you were hateful when you called people lazy and self-important for using the service if not disabled. I would gladly pay the tiny fee to have people shop for me because I have 3 kids and dont have time for bs when Im trying to squeeze in a grocery trip before work. And good for you, taking your kids with you, but guess what? This is a different day and age and I can keep everyone happy and in the car while grabbing groceries. It sounds like maybe you need to find a new job if pushing a cart around upsets you.
